remarks: Two expressions for the 1-dimensional subspaces of vector space H. (Contributed by NM, 24-Feb-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dib1dim.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dib1dim.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dib1dim.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dib1dim.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
dib1dim.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dib1dim.o $e |- O = ( h e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) $.
dib1dim.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dib1dim $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T ) -> ( I ` ( R ` F ) ) = { g e. ( T X. E ) | E. s e. E g = <. ( s ` F ) , O >. } ) $.
$d B h $.
$d E g s $.
$d F g s $.
$d H s $.
$d K h s $.
$d O g s $.
$d R s $.
$d T g h s $.
$d W h s $.
